comments.body: Now I start to think when this exception will be reached? When `emr_hook.get_cluster_id_by_name` return `None`. Is it possible or this will fail when calling `emr_hook.get_cluster_id_by_name` whith `self.job_flow_name=None`?

If you ask for a `job_flow_name` that doesn't exist it returns `None`
[emr_hook.py](https://github.com/apache/airflow/blob/master/airflow/contrib/hooks/emr_hook.py#L52-L59)
[test case](https://github.com/apache/airflow/pull/6898/files#diff-cbbc968b356f3228bd7cd913a75d6b3fR132-R149)
